alert.note: Alert for Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 21 at 3:51PM EST until November 22 at 9:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...1 to locally 2 feet of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southwest Suffolk and Southeast Suffolk Counties. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor to localized flooding is expected in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some additional localized minor coastal flooding will be possible in the next high tide cycle Wednesday afternoon, particularly for the South Shore Bays. * SHORELINE IMPACTS...For the ocean shorelines, breaking waves will result in beach erosion with only minor damage possible to dune structures. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. GREAT SOUTH BAY AT LINDENHURST NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.1 FT, MODERATE 3.6 FT, MAJOR 4.1 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 2.0 FT, MAJOR 2.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 21/05 PM 2.1/ 2.6 0.5/ 1.0 0.8/ 1.3 2 NONE 22/06 AM 3.2/ 3.7 1.7/ 2.2 2.1/ 2.6 2-3 MIN-MOD 22/06 PM 2.2/ 2.7 0.7/ 1.1 1.0/ 1.5 1 NONE GREAT SOUTH BAY AT WEST SAYVILLE NY MLLW CATEGORIES - info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
